sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
A true separation between the power of the spirit, and the imitation of Antichrist. The difference between the pretious and the vile, between the saints and professors, between the power and the form, between the wise virgins who are so indeed, and them who have gotten the name, but want the power. Hubberthorn, Richard, 1628-1662.
8 p.
s.n., [London : 1654]
Caption title. Signed at end: Richard Hubberthorne. Imprint from Wing. Annotation on Thomason copy: "Septemb: 4. 1654". Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
